actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide certain qualifications pertaining to service as a Member, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add rule XLIX which prohibits a Member from serving a term of office if such Member has served the six immediately preceding terms. Excludes from such rule service in any term that commenced before 1983.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide certain qualifications pertaining to service as a Member, and for other purposes.
